title: What technology does whatsapp use to send messages? - Quora

response.answer_text: WhatsApp has picked Erlang a language worked for composing adaptable applications that are intended to withstand blunders. Erlang utilizes an abstraction called the Actor model for it's simultaneousness. Rather than the more conventional shared memory approach, actors communicate by sending each different messages. Actors dissimilar to strings are intended to be lightweight. Actors could be on the same machine or on various machines and the message passing abstractions works for both.
